---
name: SceI_Scere
creator: keoni
description: I-SceI endonuclease codon-optimized for S. cerevisiae
prefix: A
suffix: GGATCC
sequence: 
---

Rare-cutting homing endonuclease from S. cerevisiae mitochondria codon-optimized for expression in yeast. Recognizes and cleaves the 18 bp sequence TAGGGATAACAGGGTAAT, useful for site-specific DNA double-strand breaks.
